attributes.action: Lower the voting age to 16, youths need to be heard not ignored
attributes.additional_details: In addition, allowing the younger population to vote will make them more aware of the political world, provoking them to better educated themselves regarding current affairs. I trust that the government has credible reasons for not lowering the voting threshold, however I also believe that including youths in a number of elections could be very beneficial for the subsequent generations.
attributes.background: At age 16, people should have a voice in the laws that affect their lives and a stake in the future of their country. Young people have a right to be heard and to have their interests taken seriously; most importantly elections which concern long-term effects, such as the environment.
